mapper.update:
update WINDOW_EMPLOYEES
AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_STAR = #{isStar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_PHONE = #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SATISFACTION = #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WINDOW_ID = #{windowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WINDOW_EMPLOYEES set l = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_STAR = #{isStar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_PHONE = #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFACTION = #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WINDOW_ID = #{windowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
